article_title: COMMENTARY: Obama’s religious freedom record is strong
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

(RNS) Does the current administration stand for religious freedom globally or does the delay in appointing an ambassador cast doubt on that stand? My answer: Yes.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Ethics, Institutions, Opinion, Politics, ambassador, President Barack Obama, religious freedom, Religious Freedom Day, Secretary of State John Kerry, Suzan Johnson Cook
